scripts.gulp-dev-win: start "gulp_build_components"  gulp --gulpfile=gulp.components.js watch & title components & start "gulp_build_app.js"  gulp --gulpfile=gulp.app.js watch & start "gulp_build_styles" gulp --gulpfile=gulp.styles.js watch
scripts.gulp-dev-prod: start "gulp_build_components"  gulp --gulpfile=gulp.components.js watch & title components & start "gulp_build_app.js"  gulp --gulpfile=gulp.app.js  & start "gulp_build_styles" gulp --gulpfile=gulp.styles.js
